item.title: 麦肯锡如何失去优势
item.description: 麦克基西如何失去其边缘的边缘 href =“ https://www.economist.com/business/2025/08/03/how-mckinsey-lost-its-isges-sed-” href="https://telegra.ph/How-McKinsey-lost-its-edge-eG-08-03">How McKinsey lost its edge_eG“Business has been forced to adjust itself to staggering acceleration in the rate of change,” observed McKinsey, a consultancy, in a promotional pamphlet it published in 1940年。“历史上哪个时期给高管带来了更多困难的问题？” < /blockquote>

item.title: 这个周末要看什么
item.description: 本周末要观看的是什么href =“ https://www.economist.com/culture/2025/08/01/what-to-watch-this-weekend” rel =“ noopener” target =“ _ _ _ black”> telegraph telegraph 在本周末要看什么 编剧经常努力争取Verisimimitimity。这个周末的建议，涵盖喜剧，戏剧和纪录片，屏幕上的探究现实主义和逃避现实。关于夏威夷和第二次世界大战的历史故事是坚韧不拔的。加利福尼亚的喜剧片…… < /blockquote>
